page.title: 17INDUSTRY & COMMERCE (1)
page.content: Within this area are to be found the two main sources of power for the city of Leicester, the Freeman's Meadow Electricity Station and the Gas Works. The latter used to produce coal gas, but is now just a natural gas storage and distibution centre. Two major markets are also situated within this area. The whole- -sale fruit and vegetable market is open all week, while a cattle market operates on Wednesdays for the sale and slaughter of livestock. Leicester was always renown for its wide range of industries and this is reflected within the area. Off the main roads there are to be found many small manufacturing and service indus- -tries, but the main concentrations are in two areas (1) Freeman's Common Industrial Estate & (2) Knighton Fields Industrial Estate.
